event.description: Ender Inciarte strikes out swinging.
Dansby Swanson grounds out, pitcher Noah Syndergaard to first baseman Lucas Duda.
Freddie Freeman flies out to left fielder Yoenis Cespedes.
Matt Kemp grounds out, second baseman Neil Walker to first baseman Lucas Duda.
Nick Markakis strikes out swinging.
Brandon Phillips singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Adonis Garcia grounds into a force out, third baseman Jose Reyes to second baseman Neil Walker. Brandon Phillips out at 2nd.
Tyler Flowers flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Julio Teheran strikes out swinging.

Dansby Swanson singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Jay Bruce.

Dansby Swanson lines out to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Pitching Change: Robert Gsellman replaces Fernando Salas, batting 9th.
Freddie Freeman singles on a line drive to right fielder Jay Bruce.
Matt Kemp doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Yoenis Cespedes. Freddie Freeman to 3rd.
Nick Markakis called out on strikes.
Brandon Phillips grounds into a double play, pitcher Robert Gsellman to first baseman Lucas Duda to shortstop Asdrubal Cabrera. Matt Kemp out at 3rd.
Jose Reyes called out on strikes.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Travis d'Arnaud replaces Rene Rivera.
Wilmer Flores grounds into a force out, third baseman Adonis Garcia to second baseman Brandon Phillips. Travis d'Arnaud out at 2nd. Wilmer Flores to 1st.
With Jose Reyes batting, Wilmer Flores steals (1) 2nd base.
Jose Reyes walks.
Mets challenged (tag play), call on the field was overturned: Asdrubal Cabrera singles on a ground ball to center fielder Ender Inciarte. Wilmer Flores scores. Jose Reyes to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Chaz Roe replaces Ian Krol, batting 9th.
Yoenis Cespedes walks. Jose Reyes to 3rd. Asdrubal Cabrera to 2nd.

Curtis Granderson out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Ender Inciarte. Jose Reyes scores.

Neil Walker walks. Yoenis Cespedes to 2nd.
Jay Bruce walks. Asdrubal Cabrera scores. Yoenis Cespedes to 3rd. Neil Walker to 2nd.
Lucas Duda doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Ender Inciarte. Yoenis Cespedes scores. Neil Walker scores. Jay Bruce scores.

Pitching Change: Jose Ramirez replaces Eric O'Flaherty, batting 7th.
With Wilmer Flores batting, passed ball by Tyler Flowers, Lucas Duda to 3rd. Travis d'Arnaud to 2nd.
Wilmer Flores grounds out, shortstop Dansby Swanson to first baseman Freddie Freeman.
New York Mets pitcher Noah Syndergaard left the game due to an injured hand.

Asdrubal Cabrera pops out to third baseman Jace Peterson.
Yoenis Cespedes flies out sharply to center fielder Ender Inciarte.
